did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files
1986-1987

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-2/1/2.891, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the library on 1989 September 4.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These files constitute the major record series generated by the president of the University of Virginia. The records consist chiefly of correspondence, but also include reports, minutes, clippings, memoranda, and related papers concerning all areas of business of the president's office.
The papers consist of: general files, 1986-1987; seldom used permanent files, 1970-1987; development solicitations, 1981-1987; and, committee and task force files, 1972-1988.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
Series I: General Files, 1986-1987 Boxes 1-44
Series II: Seldom-Used Permanent Files, 1970-1987 Boxes 44-49
Series III: Development Solicitation Files, 1981-1987 Boxes 50-59
Series IV: Committees and Task Forces Files, 1972-1988 Boxes 60-64
